body.name: Sweetcrispy 5 Drawers Dresser for Bedroom, Kidsroom Furniture, Small Chest Tower, Storage Organizer Units for Clothing, Closet, Fabric Bins, Wood Top, Steel Frame, Lightweight, Assemble Tools Include
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 12 hrs 49 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Check FULL-size: This dresser for bedroom with fabric bins will save your space and is a great piece of furniture to store such as magazines, clothes, or children's toys. The wooden board at the top has a load-bearing capacity of up to 66 pounds and can be used instead of a TV stand. The full size of this 5-drawer dresser is: 11.81" D x 39.37" W x 20.87" H

Smarter Storage: With 2 large drawers and 3 small drawers, you can divide the area and get exactly what you need. Each large drawer can store at least 12 ordinary adult T-shirts or 7 pairs of jeans. And you can also use small drawers to store socks, gloves, underwear, etc. This 5-drawer dresser provide more storage possibilities and plenty of space to create a neat and clean space for you.

Safe & Sturdy: This chest of drawers uses a thickened metal frame to keep the fabric dresser stable, with 4 adjustable feets to protect your floor from scratches, and you can adjust the balance of the dresser in small areas. Using the anti-tilt device, an auxiliary feature can be added if the dresser is attached to the wall, as it prevents falling caused by uneven floors or children climbing.

Vertical Uses & Lightweight: The dresser reduces the restrictions of use. You can use it freely with your existing furniture, such as replacing the TV stand in the living room, or as a dresser, bedside table, wardrobe in the bedroom, or as a shoe cabinet in the porch, corridor, hallway, etc. This fabric organizer is Lightweight, only about 21 lb, and it can be moved anywhere without much effort.

Easy Set Up: All the necessary installation tools are included in the package and you can find the guide video on this page. According to the instructions, you can complete the installation in about 30 minutes. Of course, the time will be shortened if you use your own power tools. If you have any questions about the installation process or product, we are ready to help you efficiently and at any time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweetcrispy 5 Drawers Dresser – Functional and Stylish Storage Solution
reviews.reviewText: The Sweetcrispy 5 Drawers Dresser has proven to be an excellent addition to my bedroom, providing both functionality and a touch of style to the space.Assembly was a breeze, thanks to the clear and concise instructions provided. The compact design makes it a versatile piece of furniture, fitting seamlessly into bedrooms or kids' rooms where space is a consideration. The small chest tower is an efficient storage solution without compromising on capacity.The five drawers offer ample storage space for clothing, accessories, or any other items you need to keep organized. The smooth-gliding drawers operate effortlessly, and the quality of construction gives a sense of durability. The dresser's sleek design adds a modern flair to the room without overwhelming the space.I appreciate the attention to detail in the construction of this dresser. The materials used feel sturdy, and the overall build quality gives confidence in its long-lasting performance. The neutral color palette allows for easy coordination with existing furniture and decor.What sets the Sweetcrispy dresser apart is its versatility. It serves its purpose well in the bedroom, but it could easily find a home in other areas of the house, such as a nursery or living room. The compact size doesn't sacrifice functionality, making it a practical choice for various storage needs.In conclusion, the Sweetcrispy 5 Drawers Dresser is a reliable and stylish storage solution for anyone looking to maximize space and keep things organized. With its easy assembly, quality construction, and versatile design, it's a standout choice in the realm of bedroom and kids' room furniture. I highly recommend it for those in search of an efficient and aesthetically pleasing storage solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for price
reviews.reviewText: Smelled a little like Chinese take out, if you spray your fave perfume or cologne on the fabric it helps with the smell and keeps your clothes smelling good. Super super easy to assemble, a freaking monkey could do it. It is a little small, woild be better for storage or children’s clothes. Overall, a nice product with a great price, super easy to assemble, fits in small areas and really looks great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received this item way ahead of time which I was happy about and it was well wrapped up and the box wasn’t damaged.It’s pretty sturdy and very easy to installed by yourself.The only downside is that is a little shorter than what the picture shows. You can see my picture compare to my bed. It’s a little smelly but nothing that a little febreeze can’t fix.Overall I’m happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is so pretty!!! I'm very happy with my purchase. It is great quality and easy directions.I would highly recommend it.True to size so be sure you measure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the money this is a very nice dresser/TV stand
reviews.reviewText: With the clear instructions, assembly was complete in about 30 minutes. I was a little concerned about how sturdy this was going to be but once it was together it proved to be quite stable and has a sturdy feel. The adjustable feet are a nice feature. The fabric covered softside drawers are of good quality and the drop-in bottoms are plenty strong. We needed something that was very close to this specific size, and once I put it together it has proved to be exactly what we needed. Good product and a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for additiona storage
reviews.reviewText: this is the 2nd one i bought. First was for my grandson, he loved how easy it was to put together and it gave them a little extra storage and a place to put things on top. Mine is in my closet - perfect for storage and so easy to put together. looks very nice. the amount spent was a fair price for this piece of furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Missing parts but works
reviews.reviewText: My daughter wanted it for Christmas and it came missing the handles. It was functional without the handles but we went to Home Depot and bought some. She loves it! Storage bins are roomy and it was easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect budget-friendly dresser.
reviews.reviewText: We bought this dresser for my toddler and it is perfect for that use. The drawers are not very deep, but the dresser is sturdy and appearance is great.
